title: Facebook pokes at free speech & #AllWomanSpacewalk
text:
Mark Zuckerberg comes under fire for referencing Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. in ‘free expression’ speech. Rikers Island is closing, only for five new jails to be built throughout the city. Then, NASA performed the first ever all-female spacewalk. Former NTSB Director of Public and Family Affairs Jamie Finch discusses the Air National Guard base at Truax Field that will affect the surrounding lower-income community. And a preview of this week’s episode of Redacted Tonight.
